tweet: Do you think it's called Black Friday cause it signifies the eventual end of the universe?
Happy Turkey Day everyone.  I hope you all eat a bird of some kind today.  Preferably one that gobbles.  Stay away from tofurkey it's gross.
Haven't written a lot of words down lately.  Too busy trying to figure how to write things up.
Midnight showing of the Fantastic Mr. Fox tonight. Bodacious.
The whole band is playing on the street at Handborn in Modesto this Saturday. We will be in front of Concetta's.
